title: nArAyaNi pilicitE
sahitya:
nArAyaNi pilicitE  rAvadEmi rAma (nIvu) lOkAbhi rAma kOdaNDa rAma paTTAbhirAma


anupallavi

  IrEDu lOkamulalO nIvalEcaraNagata rakSakuTu 
vErevarunnAru karuNA jaladhE tAmasambu sEyaka 


caraNam    ilalO I kalilO jEsinadella maracitivEmO alanADu nIvE rAmadAsuni brOvalEdA 
ElAvatAra-mettitivO EmEmi jEsitivO IlAgani ninnu varNimpalEnu vAsudEva brOvu
